name: 人類發展
description: 本課程內容以生命歷程（Life-Span）的觀點，探討個人從胎兒、嬰兒、幼兒、學齡兒童、青少年、成年、中年、老年各時期的生理、智力和心理社會等各項發展。介紹發展心理學有關的理論、研究、以及人生各階段的實際問題，企盼學生認識人類的成長與發展歷程，以瞭解自我，並為未來的人生旅程建立正確信念，做好生涯規畫，迎接快活老年。教學活動以講解為主，並輔以視聽媒體、報告等方式進行。
goals: 探討個人由出生至老年的發展變化
認識人類發展心理學的理論及研究方法
學習人類發展各領域發展的內涵
認識人類發展的重要影響因素
建立正確的自我信念與生命價值觀
syllabus:
一、History, theory, and research strategies

二、Genetic and environmental foundations

三、Prenatal development, birth, and the newborn baby

四、Physical development in infancy and toddlerhood

五、Cognitive development in infancy and toddlerhood

六、Emotional and social development in infancy and toddlerhood

七、Physical and cognitive development in early childhood

八、Emotional and social development in early childhood

九、Physical, cognitive, emotional and social development in middle childhood

十、Emotional and social development in middle childhood

十一、Physical, cognitive, emotional and social development in Adolescence

十二、Physical, cognitive, emotional and social development in early adulthood

十三、Physical, cognitive, emotional and social development in middle adulthood

十四、Physical, cognitive, emotional and social development in late adulthood

十五、Death, dying, and bereavement
